title: STK offers an Endless Holiday Menu with premium ingredients
statement: STK Steakhouse features an Endless Holiday Menu with rare and decadent seasonal specialties including A5 Japanese Wagyu dishes.

citations.quote: STK Endless Holiday Menu, featuring a collection of rare and decadent seasonal specialties... A5 Japanese Wagyu Potstickers... A5 Japanese Wagyu Steak Fried Rice
